en.today: Embrace activities that allow you to feel free, daring ram as the moon continues through independent Aquarius. Take time to appreciate the qualities that make you stand out from your peers while Chiron stirs this afternoon, softly bolstering your ego and sense of self. This energy also brings much healing when you contribute to the betterment of society, which will be particularly helpful if you've felt downtrodden by the news recently. Luna drifts into Pisces later today, asking you to get in touch with your emotions. However, you should avoid latching onto negative or reckless thoughts when Luna squares Uranus this evening.

en.today: The universe showers you with soft kisses and a warm lion as the Aquarius moon and Chiron align. This energy helps to restore your faith in humanity, love, and the divine forces that swirl within and around you. Focus on finding personal balance, and your intuition is sure to skyrocket. When it comes to matters of the heart, consider seeking adventure with your sweetheart. Emotional connections intensify as Luna enters Pisces, though a harsh square with Uranus threatens to rock the boat. Try to quiet any outside voices that have been meddling in your connections, allowing direct interactions to shape how you think and feel about others.

en.today: The Aquarius moon and Chiron form a sweet connection, dear Taurus, reminding you that you are in control of your destiny. Set aside some time to observe your current trajectory, taking into consideration where cycles can be broken to put you in alignment with long-term goals. You'll sense a shift once Luna enters Pisces later today, luring you toward community events. Explore your area with a fresh perspective, searching for people and establishments that are on your wavelength. Try not to get sucked into your electronics when Luna squares Uranus, which could make it challenging to stay focused on the present.
